alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:10PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wasatch...Salt Lake...southwestern Duchesne...southwestern Summit and central Utah Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 709 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Herriman to near Alpine to 11 miles east of Mapleton. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Provo, Sandy, Murray, Park City, Heber City, West Jordan, Orem, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Pleasant Grove, Cottonwood Heights, Springville, Midvale, Holladay and American Fork. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 272 and 275, and between mile markers 277 and 312. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 115 and 140, and between mile markers 143 and 147. US Route 6 between mile markers 193 and 196. US Route 40 between mile markers 0 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
